title: Zeit And You Will Trendceive 1/11: Hallmark, Twitter HQ, No Fly Lists, Andrew Yang, Kim Cattrall
itunes:title: Zeit And You Will Trendceive 1/11: Hallmark, Twitter HQ, No Fly Lists, Andrew Yang, Kim Cattrall
description:
On this edition of Zeit And You Will Trendceive Jack and Miles discuss the Hallmark Channel revoking political donations to insurrectionists, Twitter banned Donald finally, social media is blowing up with videos of terrorists realizing they're on the No Fly List, Andrew Yang is running for Mayor of New York City, and the internet is calling for Kim Cattrall to be replaced on Sex In The City.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
